Sentence.value: The cuff or band on the upper arm is removed, and the radioactive material moves through your blood.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[cuff|C1550244]] or band on the [[upper arm|C0446516]] is removed, and the radioactive material moves through your blood.

Sentence.value: Tell your health care provider if you take any nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) or blood pressure medicines.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Tell your [[health care provider|C0018724]] if you take any [[nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs|C0003211]] (NSAIDs) or blood pressure [[medicines|C0013227]].

Sentence.value: It may be done if: - You cannot have other x-rays using contrast (dye) material because you are sensitive or allergic to them, or you have reduced kidney function - You have had a kidney transplant and your doctor wants to check how well the kidney is working and look for signs of rejection - You have high blood pressure and your doctor wants to see how well your kidneys are working
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: It may be done if: - You cannot have other [[x-rays|C0043309]] using contrast (dye) material because you are sensitive or allergic to them, or you have reduced [[kidney function|C0232804]] - You have had a kidney transplant and your [[doctor|C0031831]] wants to check how well the kidney is working and look for signs of rejection - You have [[high blood pressure|C0020538]] and your [[doctor|C0031831]] wants to see how well your kidneys are working

Sentence.value: This may be due to: - Acute or chronic kidney failure - Chronic kidney infection (pyelonephritis) - Complications of a kidney transplant - Glomerulonephritis - Hydronephrosis - Injury of the kidney and ureter - Narrowing or blockage of the arteries that carry blood to the kidney - Obstructive uropathy
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This may be due to: - Acute or chronic kidney failure - Chronic kidney infection (pyelonephritis) - Complications of a kidney transplant - Glomerulonephritis - Hydronephrosis - [[Injury|C0175677]] of the [[kidney|C0022646]] and ureter - Narrowing or blockage of the [[arteries|C0003842]] that carry [[blood|C0005767]] to the kidney - Obstructive uropathy

annotation.surface-form: chronic kidney failure - Chronic kidney infection
